landingpage.hero-description: Join the TikTok Agency Incubator program to unlock tools, insights and support you need to scale faster. Get exclusive access to expert guidance, powerful marketing solutions, and real success stories to help your agency thrive.
landingpage.form-subtitle: Complete the Intake Form to Express Interest!
landingpage.form-paragraph: Gain access to tailored support, advanced resources, and growth opportunities designed to help you scale.
landingpage.form-field-business-center-id: What is your Business Center ID?
landingpage.form-field-email-error: Please enter a valid email address.
landingpage.form-field-email-format-error: Please enter a valid email format.
landingpage.form-submit-error: An error occurred while submitting the form. Please try again later.
landingpage.form-dropdown-primary-specialization: What is your agency's primary specialization?
landingpage.form-dropdown-average-spend: Average monthly spend per client on digital ads?
landingpage.form-dropdown-active-paid-media: Active paid media clients your agency manages?
landingpage.form-dropdown-start-advertising: How soon will your clients start advertising on TikTok?
landingpage.section-apply-title: What is the TikTok Agency Incubator Program?
landingpage.section-apply-description: By joining this program, your agency will run campaigns with expert strategies, enhance team skills through tailored training, and stay ahead with the latest insights and best practices in TikTok advertising for long-term success.
landingpage.section-admission-description: Submit an application to join the program, and keep an eye out for our confirmation email once your participation has been approved.
landingpage.section-benefits-title: What's in it for your Agency?
landingpage.section-benefits-description: Receive exclusive resources, TikTok ads support and invitations to events. Agencies who meet a minimum spend criteria will receive further guidance from a dedicated TikTok Ads expert. *T&Cs apply.

loginpage.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
loginpage.hero-description1: Our team will reach out to you via email shortly.
loginpage.hero-description1-2: So keep an eye on your inbox!
loginpage.hero-description2: While you wait, check out all the exciting things you’ll get from the TikTok Agency Incubator.
loginpage.sneakpeak-the-agency-sub-title: The Agency Business Center is an all-in-one hub that helps you manage your clients' payments, track performance, and collaborate to reach your goals on TikTok. This one-pager shows how to manage access to all of your clients' assets and data.
loginpage.sneakpeak-the-agency-description: The Agency Business Center is an all-in-one hub that helps you manage your clients’ payments, track performance and collaborate to reach your goals on TikTok.
loginpage.sneakpeak-business-center-description: This one pager shows how to manage access to all of your clients’ assets and data.
loginpage.sneakpeak-tik-tok-academy-description: The official TikTok learning destination for marketers and agencies. Sign up today!
loginpage.sneakpeak-agency-success-description: Discover and get inspiration from other agencies being successful on TikTok.
